---

## Installation

### Npm

```bash
npm install @coreui/bootstrap-react
```

### Yarn

```bash
yarn add @coreui/bootstrap-react
```

## Using components

```jsx

import { Alert } from '@coreui/bootstrap-react';

```

## Stylesheets

React components are styled using `bootstrap` CSS library.

### Installation

```bash
npm install bootstrap
```

or 

```bash
yarn add bootstrap
```

### Basic usage

```js
import 'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css'
```
